Detailed Description

Performs random rotation.

Function Documentation

const std::vector< float > &  vector 
)

Transform one vector.

Parameters
N- number of points
D- Number of dimensions
transformed- Transformed vector
original- Original vector
vector- Householder transformation vector (reflection hyperplane unit normal).

Transform one dataset.

Parameters
N- number of points
D- Number of dimensions
transformed- Transformed dataset
original- Original dataset
vector- Householder transformation vector (reflection hyperplane unit normal).
split_dims- transform the dataset only in these dimensions
t- size of split_dims parameter
int householder_vector ( prng_state *const  p,
std::vector< float > &  v,
const int  D 
)

Generate a pseudorandom unit vector.

Parameters
p- PRNG state to use
v- std::vector to save the vector to
D- Number of dimensions in the vector
Returns
- 0 if success, -1 if PRNG state is stuck on zero.

Parameters
